00032 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00033 #pragma warning(disable: 4996) // don't show deprecated warnings.

00048 #define DELIMCHAR 0x14
00050 #define MIN_CELLSTR 2
00051 
00053 #define CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER   0x00000040 // 64
00055 #define CELL_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER 0x00000004 // 4
00056 
00058 #define BCEL_HEADER_BYTES "BCEL\r\n\032\n"
00060 #define BCEL_HEADER_LEN 8
00062 #define STRUCT_SIZE_BCEL_HEADER_INFO 66
00064 #define STRUCT_SIZE_FEATURE_DATA 5
00066 #define STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR 8
00068 #define BCEL_CHUNK_LEN_SIZE 4
00070 #define BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE 4
00072 #define BCEL_CHUNK_CRC_SIZE 4
00074 #define BCEL_CHUNK_HEAD "HEAD"
00076 #define BCEL_CHUNK_DTHD "DTHD"
00078 #define BCEL_CHUNK_ALGM "ALGM"
00080 #define BCEL_CHUNK_ALPR "ALPR"
00082 #define BCEL_CHUNK_INTY "INTY"
00084 #define BCEL_CHUNK_MASK "MASK"
00086 #define BCEL_CHUNK_OUTL "OUTL"
00088 #define BCEL_CHUNK_TAIL "TAIL"
00089 
00091 #define CCEL_HEADER_BYTES "CCEL\r\n\128\n"
00093 #define OLD_CCEL_HEADER_BYTES "CCEL\r\n\064\n"
00095 #define CCEL_HEADER_LEN 8
00096 
00097 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00099 #define LINE_SEPARATOR "\n"
00100 #else
00102 #define LINE_SEPARATOR "\r\n"
00103 #endif
00104 
00105 #ifndef PAGE_SIZE
00107 #define PAGE_SIZE (getpagesize())
00108 #endif
00109 #ifndef PAGE_MASK
00111 #define PAGE_MASK ~(PAGE_SIZE-1)
00112 #endif
00113 #ifndef PAGE_TRUNC
00115 #define PAGE_TRUNC(ptr) (ptr&(PAGE_MASK))

00145 bool CCELFileWriter::WriteTextCel()
00146 {
00147         if (m_FileName.length() == 0)
00148         {
00149                 SetError("No file name is set for file creation.");
00150                 return false;
00151         }
00152 
00153         std::ofstream newCelFile;
00154         newCelFile.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out);
00155         if (!newCelFile)
00156         {
00157                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
00158                 return false;
00159         }
00160 
00161         m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader();
00162 
00163         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 4096;
00164         char szBuffer[MAXLINELENGTH] = "\0";
00165         int length = 0;
00166 
00167         // Write CEL
00168         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "[CEL]%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00169         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00170         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "Version=3%s%s", LINE_SEPARATOR, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00171         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00172 
00173         // Write the header.
00174         GridCoordinatesType grid = m_HeaderData.GetGridCorners();
00175         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "[HEADER]%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00176         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00177         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "Cols=%d%sRows=%d%s", m_HeaderData.GetCols(), LINE_SEPARATOR, m_HeaderData.GetRows(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00178         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00179         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "TotalX=%d%sTotalY=%d%s", m_HeaderData.GetCols(), LINE_SEPARATOR, m_HeaderData.GetRows(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00180         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00181         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "OffsetX=0%sOffsetY=0%s", LINE_SEPARATOR, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00182         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00183         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "GridCornerUL=%d %d%s", grid.upperleft.x, grid.upperleft.y, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00184         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00185         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "GridCornerUR=%d %d%s", grid.upperright.x, grid.upperright.y, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00186         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00187         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "GridCornerLR=%d %d%s", grid.lowerright.x, grid.lowerright.y, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00188         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00189         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "GridCornerLL=%d %d%s", grid.lowerleft.x, grid.lowerleft.y, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00190         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00191         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "Axis-invertX=0%sAxisInvertY=0%sswapXY=0%s", LINE_SEPARATOR, LINE_SEPARATOR, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00192         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00193         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "DatHeader=%s%s", m_HeaderData.GetDatHeader().c_str(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00194         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00195         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "Algorithm=%s%s", m_HeaderData.GetAlg().c_str(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00196         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00197         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "AlgorithmParameters=%s%s%s", m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters().c_str(), LINE_SEPARATOR, LINE_SEPARATOR);
00198         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00199 
00200         // Write the Mean header
00201         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "[INTENSITY]%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00202         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00203         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "NumberCells=%d%s", m_HeaderData.GetCells(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00204         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00205         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "CellHeader=X\tY\tMEAN\tSTDV\tNPIXELS%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00206         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00207 
00208   //
00209         for (int iCell=0; iCell < m_HeaderData.GetCells(); iCell++)
00210         {
00211     int   t_x=IndexToX(iCell);
00212     int   t_y=IndexToY(iCell);
00213     float t_mean=GetIntensity(t_x,t_y);
00214     float t_stdv=GetStdv(t_x,t_y);
00215     int   t_pixel=GetPixels(t_x,t_y);
00216 
00217     snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "%3d\t%3d\t%.1f\t%.1f\t%3d",t_x,t_y,t_mean,t_stdv,t_pixel);
00218     newCelFile<<szBuffer<<LINE_SEPARATOR;
00219         }
00220         newCelFile<<LINE_SEPARATOR;
00221 
00222 
00223         // Write the mask data
00224         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "[MASKS]%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00225         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00226         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "NumberCells=%d%s", m_HeaderData.GetMasked(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00227         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00228         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "CellHeader=X\tY%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00229         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00230         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.begin(); pos != m_MaskedCells.end(); pos++)
00231         {
00232                 length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "%d\t%d%s", IndexToX(pos->first), IndexToY(pos->first), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00233                 newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00234         }
00235         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00236         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00237 
00238         // Write the outlier data
00239         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "[OUTLIERS]%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00240         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00241         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "NumberCells=%d%s", m_HeaderData.GetOutliers(), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00242         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00243         length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "CellHeader=X\tY%s", LINE_SEPARATOR);
00244         newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00245         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_Outliers.begin(); pos != m_Outliers.end(); pos++)
00246         {
00247                 length = snprintf(szBuffer,sizeof(szBuffer), "%d\t%d%s", IndexToX(pos->first), IndexToY(pos->first), LINE_SEPARATOR);
00248                 newCelFile.write(szBuffer, length);
00249         }
00250 
00251         // Close the file and check the status.
00252         newCelFile.close();
00253 
00254         return !newCelFile.fail();
00255 }

00265 bool CCELFileWriter::WriteXDABCel()
00266 {
00267         if (m_FileName.length() == 0)
00268         {
00269                 SetError("No file name is set for file creation.");
00270                 return false;
00271         }
00272 
00273         std::ofstream newCelFile;
00274         newCelFile.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00275         if (!newCelFile)
00276         {
00277                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
00278                 return false;
00279         }
00280 
00281         m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader();
00282 
00283         // Write the header.
00284         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, CELL_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER);
00285         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, CELL_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER);
00286 
00287         // Write the dimensions of the array
00288         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetRows());
00289         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetCols());
00290         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetCells());
00291 
00292         // Write the other members.
00293         WriteString_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetHeader());
00294         WriteString_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetAlg());
00295         WriteString_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters());
00296         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetMargin());
00297         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetOutliers());
00298         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetMasked());
00299         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, 0);
00300 
00301         // Write the Mean data
00302         for (int iCell=0; iCell < m_HeaderData.GetCells(); iCell++) 
00303         {
00304                 int   t_x=IndexToX(iCell);
00305                 int   t_y=IndexToY(iCell);
00306                 float t_mean=GetIntensity(t_x,t_y);
00307                 float t_stdv=GetStdv(t_x,t_y);
00308                 uint16_t t_pixel=GetPixels(t_x,t_y);
00309 
00310                 WriteFloatLowPrecision(newCelFile,t_mean);
00311                 WriteFloatLowPrecision(newCelFile,t_stdv);
00312                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile,t_pixel);
00313         }
00314 
00315         // Write the mask data
00316         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.begin(); pos != m_MaskedCells.end(); pos++)
00317         {
00318                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile, (uint16_t) IndexToX(pos->first));
00319                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile, (uint16_t) IndexToY(pos->first));
00320         }
00321 
00322         // Write the outlier data
00323         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_Outliers.begin(); pos != m_Outliers.end(); pos++)
00324         {
00325                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile, (uint16_t) IndexToX(pos->first));
00326                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile, (uint16_t) IndexToY(pos->first));
00327         }
00328 
00329         // Close the file and check the status.
00330         newCelFile.close();
00331 
00332         return !newCelFile.fail();
00333 }

00343 bool CCELFileWriter::WriteTranscriptomeBCel()
00344 {
00345         if (m_FileName.length() == 0)
00346         {
00347                 SetError("No file name is set for file creation.");
00348                 return false;
00349         }
00350 
00351         std::ofstream newCelFile;
00352         newCelFile.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00353         if (!newCelFile)
00354         {
00355                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
00356                 return false;
00357         }
00358 
00359         m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader();
00360 
00361         // Write the header
00362         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_HEADER_BYTES, BCEL_HEADER_LEN);
00363         WriteFloat_N(newCelFile, (float)m_HeaderData.GetVersion());
00364 
00365         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, STRUCT_SIZE_BCEL_HEADER_INFO);
00366         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_HEAD, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00367         WriteFloat_N(newCelFile, (float)m_HeaderData.GetVersion());
00368         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetCols());              // columns
00369         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetRows());              // rows
00370         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetCols());              // totalx
00371         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetRows());              // totaly
00372         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);                                                   // offsetx
00373         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);                                                   // offsety
00374 
00375         GridCoordinatesType grid = m_HeaderData.GetGridCorners();
00376         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.upperleft.x);                    // GridCornerUL.x
00377         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.upperleft.y);                    // GridCornerUL.y
00378         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.upperright.x);                   // GridCornerUR.x
00379         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.upperright.y);                   // GridCornerUR.y
00380         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.lowerleft.x);                    // GridCornerLL.y
00381         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.lowerleft.y);                    // GridCornerLL.x
00382         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.lowerright.x);                   // GridCornerLR.x
00383         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, grid.lowerright.y);                   // GridCornerLR.x
00384         WriteUInt16_N(newCelFile, 0);                                                   // Axis-invertX
00385         WriteUInt16_N(newCelFile, 0);                                                   // AxisInvertY
00386         WriteUInt16_N(newCelFile, 0);                                                   // swapXY
00387         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00388 
00389         int length = (int) m_HeaderData.GetDatHeader().length();                // DatHeader
00390         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, length);
00391         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_DTHD, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00392         if (length > 0)
00393                 WriteFixedString(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetDatHeader(), length);
00394         else
00395         {
00396                 SetError("Missing DatHeader.");
00397                 Close();
00398                 return 0;
00399         }
00400         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00401 
00402         length = (int) m_HeaderData.GetAlg().length();                                  // Algorithm
00403         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, length);
00404         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_ALGM, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00405         if (length > 0)
00406                 WriteFixedString(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetAlg(), length);
00407         else
00408         {
00409                 SetError("Missing Algorithm.");
00410                 Close();
00411                 return 0;
00412         }
00413         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00414 
00415         length = (int) m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters().length();  // AlgorithmParameters
00416         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, length);
00417         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_ALPR, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00418         if (length > 0)
00419                 WriteFixedString(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters(), length);
00420         else
00421         {
00422                 SetError("Missing Algorithm Parameters.");
00423                 Close();
00424                 return 0;
00425         }
00426         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00427 
00428         // Write the Mean data
00429         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile,(uint32_t)(m_HeaderData.GetCells() * STRUCT_SIZE_FEATURE_DATA));
00430         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_INTY, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00431         for (int iCell=0; iCell < m_HeaderData.GetCells(); iCell++) {
00432     int   t_x=IndexToX(iCell);
00433     int   t_y=IndexToY(iCell);
00434     float t_mean=GetIntensity(t_x,t_y);
00435     float t_stdv=GetStdv(t_x,t_y);
00436     uint16_t t_pixel=GetPixels(t_x,t_y);
00437 
00438     WriteUInt16_N(newCelFile,(uint16_t)RoundNumber(t_mean));
00439     WriteUInt16_N(newCelFile,(uint16_t)RoundNumber(t_stdv));
00440     WriteUInt8(newCelFile,(uint8_t)t_pixel);
00441         }
00442         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0); // crc
00443 
00444         // Write the mask data
00445         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile,(uint32_t)(m_HeaderData.GetMasked() * STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR));
00446         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_MASK, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00447         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.begin(); pos != m_MaskedCells.end(); pos++)
00448         {
00449                 WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, (uint32_t) IndexToX(pos->first));
00450                 WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, (uint32_t) IndexToY(pos->first));
00451         }
00452         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00453 
00454         // Write the outlier data
00455         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, (uint32_t) (m_HeaderData.GetOutliers() * STRUCT_SIZE_XY_PAIR));
00456         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_OUTL, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00457         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_Outliers.begin(); pos != m_Outliers.end(); pos++)
00458         {
00459                 WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, (uint32_t) IndexToX(pos->first));
00460                 WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, (uint32_t) IndexToY(pos->first));
00461         }
00462         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00463 
00464         // Write tail
00465         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00466         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, BCEL_CHUNK_TAIL, BCEL_CHUNK_NAME_SIZE);
00467         WriteUInt32_N(newCelFile, 0);
00468 
00469         // Close the file and check the status.
00470         newCelFile.close();
00471 
00472         return !newCelFile.fail();
00473 }
00474 
00483 bool CCELFileWriter::WriteCompactBCel()
00484 {
00485         if (m_FileName.length() == 0)
00486         {
00487                 SetError("No file name is set for file creation.");
00488                 return false;
00489         }
00490 
00491         std::ofstream newCelFile;
00492         newCelFile.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::out | std::ios::binary);
00493         if (!newCelFile)
00494         {
00495                 SetError("Unable to open the file.");
00496                 return false;
00497         }
00498 
00499         m_HeaderData.SetDatHeader();
00500 
00501         // Write the header
00502         WriteFixedString(newCelFile, CCEL_HEADER_BYTES, CCEL_HEADER_LEN);
00503         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetVersion());
00504 
00505         // Write the dimensions of the array
00506         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetRows());
00507         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetCols());
00508         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetCells());
00509 
00510         // Write the other members.
00511         WriteString_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetHeader().c_str());
00512         WriteString_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetAlg().c_str());
00513         WriteString_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetAlgorithmParameters().c_str());
00514         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetMargin());
00515         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, m_HeaderData.GetMasked());
00516         WriteUInt32_I(newCelFile, 0);
00517 
00518         // Write the Mean data
00519         for (int iCell=0; iCell < m_HeaderData.GetCells(); iCell++)
00520         {
00521                 int   t_x=IndexToX(iCell);
00522                 int   t_y=IndexToY(iCell);
00523                 float t_mean=GetIntensity(t_x,t_y);
00524 
00525                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile,(uint16_t)RoundNumber(t_mean));
00526         }
00527 
00528         // Write the mask data
00529         for(std::map<int, bool>::iterator pos = m_MaskedCells.begin(); pos != m_MaskedCells.end(); pos++)
00530         {
00531                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile, (uint16_t) IndexToX(pos->first));
00532                 WriteUInt16_I(newCelFile, (uint16_t) IndexToY(pos->first));
00533         }
00534 
00535         // Close the file and check the status.
00536         newCelFile.close();
00537 
00538         return !newCelFile.fail();
00539 }
